TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TtsEngineSsml extends System.Object

summary.span: 所有的语音合成引擎文字可实现的抽象基类。

span.span: Abstract base class to be implemented by all text to speech synthesis engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要构造一个自定义文本到语音转换引擎，应用程序必须始终实现派生自抽象基类的类。To construct a custom text to speech engine, an application must always implement a class derived from the abstract base class . 已正确注册的实现然后用作通过合成语音基于应用程序的命名空间。A properly registered implementation of can then be used as a synthesizer voice by name space based applications. 对象继承自必须重写以下成员： ， ， ，和。Objects inheriting from must override the following members: , , , and . 最重要的成员类来实现是方法。The most important member of the class to be implemented is the method. 接收基础结构文本分析器调用方法：The method is called by the infrastructures text parser receiving: 1. 对引用接口，它提供了对如甚至队列和写入音频输出的系统服务的访问。A reference to the interface, which provides access to system services such as even queuing and writing audio output. 2. 一个数组从语音合成标记语言 (SSML) 输入生成的实例。An array of instance produced from Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) input. 除了要作为语音呈现的文本，之外的 SSML 分析存储中的语音的信息请求的属性与每个传入关联实例对象。In addition to text to be rendered as speech, the parsing of the SSML stores information about the requested attributes of the speech in a instance associated with each incoming object. 语音合成器应用程序可以通过实现可以选择使指定的输出格式的请求尝试提供正确的音频输出时，平台调用。A speech synthesizer application can optionally make requests for a specified output format by implementing to be called by the platform when it tries to provide the correct audio output. 实施者还可以用于管理其实现的外部定义的发音或词典，提供支持和。An implementer can also provide support for managing external definitions of pronunciations, or lexicons, by their implementation of and .

param.span: 与 实现相关的语音标记的注册表项的全名。

span.span: Full name of the registry key for the Voice Token associated with the implementation.
engine.

summary.span: 基于相应的语音标记注册表项构建新的 实例。

span.span: Constructs a new instance of based on an appropriate Voice Token registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数通常都由基于选择合成语音的应用程序的实例使用。Calls to this constructor are typically generated by based applications selecting a synthesizer voice to be used by an instance of . 一个必须是下 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens 寄存器。A must be register under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Speech\Voices\Tokens.

param.span: 媒体类型要区分大小写。

span.span: Media types are case insensitive.

param.name: site
param.span: 对用于与平台基础结构进行交互的 接口的引。

span.span: A reference to an interface used to interact with the platform infrastructure.

summary.span: 添加词典到当前 实例实现的 。

span.span: Adds a lexicon to the implemented by the current instance.

span.para: 它负责实现，以完全熟悉并能处理存储在词典。实现还必须跟踪和管理的所有词典，它将添加的生存期。

It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at . The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it adds.

summary.span: 返回对向合成器引擎请求支持特定输出格式的给定合成引擎响应支持的最佳匹配音频输出。

span.span: Returns the best matching audio output supported by a given synthesize engine response to a request to the synthesizer engine for the support of a particular output format.

returns.span: 返回引用包含有关输出格式的详细信息 的有效 实例。

span.span: Returns a valid instance referring to a containing detailed information about the output format.

span.para: 对象继承自应检查由指定的请求的输出格式并返回它支持的最接近格式。
Object inheriting from should examine the requested output format as specified by and return the closest format that it supports.

span.span: Removes a lexicon currently loaded by the implemented by the current instance.

span.para: 它负责实现，以完全熟悉并能处理存储在词典。实现还必须跟踪和管理它会删除所有词典的生存期。

It is the responsibility of the implementation to be fully familiar with and be able to process the lexicon stored at . The implementation must also keep track and manage the lifetimes of all lexicons it removes.

summary.span: 在指定的输出格式呈现指定的 数组。

span.span: Renders specified array in the specified output format.

span.para: 使用自定义语音合成器实现并皆用作筛选器或合成器应用程序使用的平台基础结构的成员通过构造之间的媒介命名空间和系统语音合成引擎的基础。一个实现： 1。捕获或修改传入的各个方面对象 2。生成任何必需的事件使用的站点引用实例 3。生成实际的合成的语音。生成语音最通常是通过调用Speak语音呈现引擎提供的操作系统之一上。如果用语音呈现引擎之一未使用，继承的对象必须创建自己的语音呈现引擎。访问权限Speak上获得使用注册表和反射的方法。继承自，必须重写以下成员： ， ， ， ，并。

Custom speech synthesizer implements using and work as filters or intermediaries between synthesizer applications constructed using the platform infrastructure through the members of the namespace and underlying system speech synthesis engines. A implementation: 1. Traps or modify aspects of the incoming objects 2. Generates any necessary events using the site reference to a instance 3. Generates the actual synthesized speech. Generation of speech is most typically done by calling Speak on one of the speech rendering engines provided by the operating system. If one of the available speech rendering engines is not used, a object inheriting from must create its own speech rendering engine. Access to the Speak method on obtained using the registry and reflection. . When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , and .
